name: Perfect Day
description:
After a hard week of working at the local Coal Mine, Truck Stop, Games Company, Retirement home, IT Giant, Death Star, Medieval Inn, Farm Thingy... Whatever!!!! You decide its time for a Day out at your local Pub! Be all that you can be! Talk to strangers! Drink Beer! Eat Great Food! Vomit! Survive as many Rounds as possible for Maximal Life Happiness!
NOTHING CAN STOP YOU NOW!

A gaming experience by:
Snorkelitzor
Raquel Meyers
Douglas Holmquist

Made on NO$GAMEJAM last weekend forever!
(the best game jam ever)
